properties.name: javalidator.max-class-hierarchy-depth
properties.description: Maximum depth when traversing class hierarchy for fields.

properties.name: javalidator.validate-field-names
properties.description: Whether to validate field names used in conditional rules.

properties.name: javalidator.field-name-pattern
properties.description: Regex pattern for valid field names.

properties.name: javalidator.aspect.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the validation AOP aspect.

properties.name: javalidator.aspect.validate-get-requests
properties.description: Whether to validate GET request parameters.

properties.name: javalidator.aspect.validate-delete-requests
properties.description: Whether to validate DELETE request parameters.

properties.name: javalidator.exception-handler.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the global exception handler.

properties.name: javalidator.exception-handler.include-path
properties.description: Whether to include the request path in error responses.

properties.name: javalidator.exception-handler.include-timestamp
properties.description: Whether to include a timestamp in error responses.

properties.name: javalidator.exception-handler.message
properties.description: Custom error message for validation failures.
